name: Crashy Cops!
description:
Drive as far as you can. Increase your speed with the aid of boosters. But don’t forget to change the gear, otherwise you will break down your car in many pieces. Use Nitro to drive faster and get more coins. Upgrade your car and beat your own records. Can you reach 50 000 meters?
Features:
* Change gears to drive faster;
* Upgrade your car to achieve the max speed;
* Improve transmission of your car;
* Unlock new worlds;
* Double your earned coins after watching the video ad.
